item.title: Portainer Container Management on Linux microPlatform
item.description: At Open Source Foundries, we are constantly looking across the ecosystem for the best projects to complement the microPlatforms. One such project is Portainer. “Portainer is an open-source lightweight management UI which allows you to easily manage your Docker hosts or swarm clusters.”
